title: Honda launches retro classic CB350 motorcycle: Price, colors, and specifications revealed
description: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India (HMSI) has unveiled the all-new retro classic CB350 motorcycle, aiming to offer customers a timeless classic design coupled with modern features. This introduction is expected to make a significant impact in the mid-size 350cc motorcycle segment, showcasing Honda's commitment to blending distinctive styling with contemporary advancements.
